snippet: A little noise is to be expected in a city, but sound-control door seals and soft music can go a long way with buyers.
abstract: Market Ready Q&A answers question about dealing with issue of noisy elevators when trying to sell an apartment.
lead_paragraph: A little noise is to be expected in a city, but sound-control door seals and soft music can go a long way with buyers.

headline.main: My Apartment Gets a Lot of Noise From the Hallway—Is That a Problem?
